bio_content: I'm a full-stack developer, passionate about web development. During my college years, I actively contributed to various projects, taking on different roles in both front-end and back-end development.
I'm looking for new opportunities to apply my knowledge, learn and grow as a professional. I'm open to learning new technologies by using a hands-on approach.
